Types

DBConnectionPool = ref object
  connections*: seq[DbConn]
  busyConnections*: seq[DbConn]
DBDriver = enum
  PostgreSQLDriver, MYSQLDriver, SQLiteDriver

proc getInstance(): ptr Ozark {....raises: [Exception], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Get the singleton instance of the database manager 
proc initOzarkDatabase(address, name, user, password: string; port: Port;
                       driver: DBDriver = DBDriver.PostgreSQLDriver) {.
    ...raises: [Exception], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Initializes the singleton instance of the database manager using provided credentials as main database

Macros

macro withDatabase(id: static string; body: untyped)

Use the specified database context to run database queries.

This macro will open a connection to the database, execute the body, and then close the connection.

macro withDB(body: untyped)

Use the current database context to run database queries.

This macro will open a connection to the database, execute the body, and then close the connection.
